key.name: cookie
key.description: The cookie value to be used in API requests for authentication.

key.name: user-id
key.description: The user ID to be used in API requests for identifying the user. you can find it in the URL of your Cursor profile page. it is like `https://www.cursor.com/api/usage?user=user_xxxxxxxxxxx` the `user_xxxxxxxxxxx` is the user id.

key.name: monthly-quota
key.description: The monthly quota limit for API usage. Default is set to 500 requests per month.

key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to check for API usage updates, in seconds. Default is 60 (1 minute).

key.name: debug-mode
key.description: Enable debug logging. When enabled, the extension will output debug information to the system log.
